Goku's Incredible Transformations

Base Form

Goku's natural state, but don't underestimate his power!

Super Saiyan

The legendary transformation with immense power increases.

Super Saiyan 2

An electrifying ascension beyond Super Saiyan, this form grants even greater power and speed. Sparks of lightning surge around the user, and their hair becomes even spikier and more defined.

Super Saiyan 3

A truly awe-inspiring form with drastically increased power, marked by dramatically long, flowing hair and the disappearance of eyebrows. However, this power comes at the cost of extreme energy consumption.

Super Saiyan God

A divine form achieved through ritual, granting immense power far beyond previous Super Saiyan levels. This transformation is marked by fiery red hair and a leaner build.

Super Saiyan Blue

Also known as Super Saiyan God Super Saiyan, this form combines the power of Super Saiyan God with the Super Saiyan transformation. It's distinguished by Goku's vibrant blue hair and aura.

Ultra Instinct

Not a traditional transformation, but a state of being where the user separates consciousness from their body. Ultra Instinct grants unparalleled reflexes, speed, and combat intuition. It's often marked by silver hair and eyes.
